name: Bismarck
offline: Once again, I shall return to Brest... I've exchanged enough shells... I'm...satisfied...
ownAnswers: Guten Tag. I am Bismarck, the nameship of the Bismarck-class battleships. You should remember it well.
marryAnswers: Yeeeessss!! ヽ(*≧ω≦)ﾉ
No, you are annoying.
(you ran away before asking ¯\_(ツ)_/¯)
no
* run away ε＝ε＝┌(;ﾟдﾟ)┘ *
I think I hear someone calling me... way, way over there...
Sorry, it's not you; it’s your facial hair. And your shirt. And your personality.
I'm deaf in my left ear, so I can't really understand what you're saying. Nope, sorry, still can't hear you––my right ear isn't that great either.
Aww, you like me? That's sweet... Now stop.
Hahaha! Oh wait, you're serious... no.
No offense, but I just could never marry you...
It's such a relief that you're gay! ...You are gay, right? (◎_◎;)
hmmm cheesecake... huh? Did you say something?
Sorry, I'm too much steel for your little ship. =/
Stop staring at my tanks... *perv*  ಠ‸ಠ
H-huh? W-what are you saying so sudden? \(⸝⸝≧ㅿ≦⸝⸝)/
Don't worry! We will ***always*** be friends! (> ^_^ )>
Eh? Say whaaaaaat?
Sorry...
... Do I know you?
(Tirpitz appeared and took Bismarck away)
(You forgot the ring)
(Shimakaze took your ring and started running... good luck outrunning her)
(She isn't at the base right now)
Sorry, I'm already *commissioned*...

chatAnswers.\\bt+i+r+p+i+t+z+\\b: Are you talking about my sister?
chatAnswers.\\bd+e+r+p+i+t+z+\\b: Stop kidding my sister or you will meet my eight 15 inch guns.

hourlyNotification.0: 12 o'clock midnight. I'm a little tired.
hourlyNotification.1: 1 A.M. Admiral, is it not about time for bed?
hourlyNotification.2: 2 A.M. *ya~wn*... Of course, I'm tired also...
hourlyNotification.3: 3 A.M. You will rise properly tomorrow, yes? Could you please be punctual in the morning?
hourlyNotification.4: 4 A.M. I shall take a short nap. All-nighters are bad for the skin.
hourlyNotification.5: It's 5 A.M. Alrighty, get up! Guten Morgen!
hourlyNotification.6: 6 A.M. Well now, Admiral, let's go and get all the morning affairs in order!
hourlyNotification.7: 7 A.M. Admiral, it is time for breakfast. What have you prepared for me?
hourlyNotification.8: 8 A.M. This Admiral-made breakfast is pretty good. Japanese-style isn't bad.
hourlyNotification.9: 9 A.M. Well now, let us up and go and start today's commerce raiding! ...Eh, I'm mistaken?
hourlyNotification.10: 10 A.M. Kongou? Nagato? No, I don't know them. Who are they? Are they strong?
hourlyNotification.11: It's 11 A.M... Yamato-class? That's got a strong feeling to it. I'd like to meet them.
hourlyNotification.12: I am informing you that is it now 12 midday. Well now, what would be good for lunch?
hourlyNotification.13: 1 P.M. Oh, those destroyers of a familiar ship class are here. I know those kids.
hourlyNotification.14: 2 P.M. I wonder if Scharnhorst has also come here. I still would like to meet her.
hourlyNotification.15: It's 3 P.M. I'd like to eat a little something sweet. Hey Admiral, did you hear me?
hourlyNotification.16: 4 P.M. Almost evening, no? Shall we leave it at this?
hourlyNotification.17: 5 P.M. Phew~, today was hard work as well. Well now, shall we stop at this checkpoint for today?
hourlyNotification.18: 6 P.M. Almost time for dinner. Admiral, what kind of menu do you have for me?
hourlyNotification.19: It is 7 P.M. The Admiral's sauerkraut has an odd flavor... Oh, this is 'tsukemono', you say?
hourlyNotification.20: 8 P.M. It's really night now... It's bad for my skin, so could we not go on a night battle?
hourlyNotification.21: 9 P.M. H~mm, Japanese battleships have such tall bridges. Those sisters sure are something.
hourlyNotification.22: It's 10 P.M. I shall take a rest soon.
hourlyNotification.23: 11 P.M. Admiral, are you still going? Gute Nacht.
